text: Porphyrobacter tepidarius is a moderately thermophilic and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Porphyrobacter which has been isolated from a hot spring in Usami in Japan. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Porphyrobacter tepidarius at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 1997 Category:Thermophiles
title: Porphyrobacter tepidarius
